title: Top 10 Things to Do on Valentine's Day in...
text:
1. Vancouver Hot Chocolate Festival 
Chocolate on Valentine's Day is pretty much a given, but that doesn't mean it has to be the same-old, same-old. Treat your partner to new and extremely unusual hot chocolate flavours (yes, there is bacon!) at the 25 participating Vancouver chocolate makers and artisans during the annual Vancouver Hot Chocolate Festival. 
When: January 16 - February 14, 2016 More » 
continue reading below our video Tips for Taking Better Travel Photos Robson Square Ice Rink at night. Image Courtesy of Tourism Vancouver/ Coast Mountain Photography 2. Free Ice Skating at Robson Square 
When it comes to things to do on Valentine's Day in Vancouver that are cheap and fun for all ages, you can't beat the free ice skating at downtown Vancouver's Robson Square . Take the whole family, or make it romantic by role-playing the ice skating romance from The Cutting Edge . Skate rentals are just $4; helmets and ice cleats are $2. Bonus: The ice rink will play romantic music and have lots of decor just for Valentine's Day! 
When: Daily through February 28, 2016, including February 14, 2016 More » 3. The People's Prom - 19+ 
The annual People's Prom is one of the most unique things to do on Valentine's Day in Vancouver. Not only is the People's Prom "the prom you never had in high school: it’s a radical, community-oriented, anti-capitalist, queer, cross-dressing, gender bending, bike loving, slow dancing, big dress wearing, good time," it's also a fundraiser for "creative resistance and direct action in BC." 
This event often sells out, so buy tickets fast! 
When: February 13, 2016 More » Dinner aboard the Pride of Vancouver. Image Courtesy of Spirit Cruises 4. Valentine's Day Dinner Cruise on Pride of Vancouver 
Looking for things to do on Valentine's Day in Vancouver that are old-school romantic? How about a harbour cruise aboard the luxurious Pride of Vancouver that includes a lavish dinner, your own candle-lit table, dancing, and, of course, stunning waterfront views? Tickets are $120 plus a service fee. 
When: February 14, 2016 More » Two fish kissing. Image Courtesy of the Vancouver Aquarium 5. Hugs & Fishes Sleepover at the Vancouver Aquarium - 19+ 
The Vancouver Aquarium offers adults a unique Valentine's Day event: a party and sleepover at the Aquarium that includes a three course plated dinner, wine, romantic games, a behind-the-scenes tour of the Aquarium, and a chance to sleep with the Belugas. Tickets are $400 per couple for non-members ($170 for dinner only). 
When: February 13, 2016 More » 6. Burlesque Duos at Rio Theatre - 19+ 
Easy to get to---since its just across the street from the Commercial/Broadway SkyTrain Station---East Van's Rio Theatre is an ideal Valentine's Day destination for adults 19+ who want something a teeny bit naughty this Valentine's Day: Burlesque Duos features duets between eight of Vancouver’s top burlesque performers. Tickets are $20 in advance/$25 at the door. 
When: February 13, 2016 More » Chinese New Year Parade 2013. Image Courtesy of the Chinese Benevolent Association of Vancouver 7. Vancouver Chinese New Year's Events 
This year, Valentine's Day falls on the same weekend as Chinese New Year, which means you can celebrate both at the same time! Free Chinese New Year events include the Vancouver Chinese New Year Parade , LunarFest, and Chinese New Year at the International Village. 
When: February 12 - 14, 2016; the Vancouver Chinese New Year Parade is on February 14. More » Proposing on Grouse Mountain. Image Courtesy of Grouse Mountain 8. Valentine's Day on Grouse Mountain 
Grouse Mountain hosts two Valentine's Day events this year. Their Valentine's Day Dinner 2016 includes a five-course dinner at the The Observatory. There's also the Valentine's Day Snowshoe Fondue 2016 : an hour-long guided group snowshoe tour followed by a chocolate fondue in the Alpine Timber Room. 
When: February 13 - 14, 2016 More » Image Courtesy of Absolute Spa Group 
Many of Vancouver's top spas offer special Valentine's Day couples packages, sometimes at a discounted price.
